title: These celebrities ‘subscribed to Twitter Blue.’ Except they’re dead.
description: Chadwick Boseman, Michael Jackson and Kobe Bryant are among the public figures Twitter labeled as having paid for a new subscription program costing $8 a month.

title: AI can help you with that opening line in an age of automated dating
description: Using dating apps can be a slog. But there are AI programs that will ease the travail. Just be warned that they are not perfect.
